label: 藤原師通
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1062-1099). Chancellor from 1094 to 1099. His tutor was Masafusa. Learned the biwa from Tsunenobu. Skilled at kemari (court kickball). Kanshi in Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (5). Diary Nochi no Nijo Moromichi ki. [匡房、琵琶、経信、蹴鞠、漢詩、後二条師通記]
